terminal.title: Interactive Terminal
terminal.subtitle: Explore my portfolio from the command line. Type 'help' to get started.
terminal.welcome:
Welcome to Luca Alonso's terminal! 🚀

Type 'help' to see available commands.
Type 'whoami' to learn more about me.

help.title: Available commands:
help.list:
whoami     - Information about me
  ls         - List projects
  cat about.md - Read my biography
  skills     - View my technical skills
  projects   - Explore my projects
  contact    - Contact information
  clear      - Clear terminal
  date       - Current date and time
  echo       - Repeat message
  github     - Open my GitHub
  linkedin   - Open my LinkedIn
  resume     - Download my CV
  matrix     - Matrix effect
  weather    - Current weather
  fortune    - Random motivational quote
  exit       - Exit terminal

whoami.title: luca-alonso-froeling
whoami.content:
👋 Hello! I'm Luca Alonso Froeling
🎓 Web Application Development student at ESIC
📚 2 years of prior training in Software Engineering
💻 Passionate Full Stack Developer
🚀 Specialized in React, Next.js, Python and more
🌍 Madrid, Spain
🎯 Looking for opportunities to grow professionally

ls.title: 📁 Available projects:
ls.content:
📂 7indoorgolf/     - Golf booking system
  📂 etg-website/     - Golf technical school
  📂 portfolio/       - This portfolio (current!)
  📂 university/      - Academic projects
  📂 experiments/     - Ideas laboratory
  📂 open-source/     - Community contributions

about.title: # About Me - Luca Alonso Froeling
about.content:
## 🎯 My Story
I'm a passionate Web Application Development student at ESIC with 
a solid technical background. With two years of prior study in 
Software Engineering, I've acquired a strong foundation in modern 
web development. I love creating innovative solutions and constantly 
learning new technologies.

## 💼 Professional Experience
- Full Stack Developer on real projects
- React and Next.js specialist
- Experience with APIs and databases
- Working with real clients and deadlines

## 🎓 Education
- Web Application Development - ESIC (Currently)
- Software Engineering - 2 years of training
- Specialized web development courses
- Modern technology certifications

## 🌟 Passions
- Innovative software development
- Continuous learning
- Contributing to open source projects
- Solving complex problems

projects.title: 🚀 My Featured Projects:
projects.content:
1. 7 Indoor Golf (https://7indoorgolf.com/)
   💻 Next.js + React + Tailwind CSS
   🎯 Complete booking system
   📱 Responsive and modern design

2. ETG - Golf Technical School
   💻 React + Advanced animations
   🎯 Professional website
   📱 SEO optimized

3. This Portfolio
   💻 Next.js + TypeScript + Framer Motion
   🎯 Interactive terminal (current!)
   📱 Unique user experience
